cells.name: Assassin`s Vigor
cells.description: Grants Health after breaking a Behemoth part.
cells.level01: Heal 50 when you break a part
cells.level02: Heal 100 when you break a part
cells.level03: Heal 150 when you break a part
cells.level04: Heal 200 when you break a part
cells.level05: Heal 250 when you break a part
cells.level06: Heal 300 when you break a part

cells.name: Bloodless
cells.description: Protects against Wounded and Crippling Wounds statuses.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 50%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 80%
cells.level04: Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 50%</br>Immune to Wounded status
cells.level05: Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 80%</br>Immune to Wounded status
cells.level06: Immune to Wounded status</br>Immune to Crippling Wound status

cells.name: Fireproof
cells.description: Protects against being set on fire.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 10%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 20%
cells.level03: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 40%
cells.level04: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 60%
cells.level05: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 80%
cells.level06: Immune to being set on fire.

cells.name: Fortress
cells.description: Grants a small shield after avoiding damage for a short time.
cells.level01: Grants a 10 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level02: Grants a 20 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level03: Grants a 40 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level04: Grants a 60 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level05: Grants a 80 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level06: Grants a 100 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

cells.name: Insulated
cells.description: Protects against Shocked status effect and allows you to attack electric shields.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 25%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 50%
cells.level03: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
cells.level04: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%</br>Reduces knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.
cells.level05: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%</br>Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.
cells.level06: Immune to Shocked status</br>Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.

cells.name: Nine Lives
cells.description: Grants a chance to reduce damage, and later the ability to cheat death.
cells.level04: +12% chance to halve incoming damage</br>The first time you would be knocked out, stay up and heal for 400
cells.level05: +16% chance to halve incoming damage</br>The first time you would be knocked out, stay up and heal for 400
cells.level06: +20% chance to halve incoming damage</br>The first time you would be knocked out, stay up and heal for 400, and become empowered for 10 seconds

cells.name: Shellshock Resist
cells.description: Protects against the explosion damage and status effect Shellshock.
cells.level01: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 10%
cells.level02: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 20%
cells.level03: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 40%
cells.level04: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 60%
cells.level05: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 80%
cells.level06: Immune to Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect

cells.name: Sturdy
cells.description: Prevents being staggered on a cooldown.
cells.level01: Prevents you from being staggered (120 second cooldown)
cells.level02: Prevents you from being staggered (100 second cooldown)
cells.level03: Prevents you from being staggered (80 second cooldown)
cells.level04: Prevents you from being staggered (60 second cooldown)
cells.level05: Prevents you from being staggered (40 second cooldown)
cells.level06: Prevents you from being staggered (15 second cooldown)

cells.name: Tough
cells.description: Increases Max Health.
cells.level04: Increases Max Health by 250
cells.level05: Increases Max Health by 350
cells.level06: Increases Max Health by 500

cells.name: Warmth
cells.description: Protects against Chilled and Frozen status effects.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of Frozen status by 30%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of Frozen status by 60%
cells.level04: Reduces duration of Chilled status by 30%</br>Immune to being Frozen
cells.level05: Reduces duration of Chilled status by 60%</br>Immune to being Frozen
cells.level06: Immune to being Frozen</br>Immune to being Chilled

cells.name: Agility
cells.description: Reduces the stamina cost of dodging.
cells.level04: -40% Dodge Roll Stamina Cost
cells.level05: -55% Dodge Roll Stamina Cost
cells.level06: -70% Dodge Roll Stamina Cost

cells.name: Conditioning
cells.description: Increases Stamina Regen.
cells.level04: +20 Stamina Regeneration
cells.level05: +25 Stamina Regeneration
cells.level06: +30 Stamina Regeneration

cells.name: Endurance
cells.description: Increases Max Stamina.
cells.level04: Increases Max Stamina by 60
cells.level05: Increases Max Stamina by 80
cells.level06: Increases Max Stamina by 100

cells.name: Evasion
cells.description: Increases the time you are invincible when dodging.
cells.level04: Increases Dodge invulnerability windows by 28%
cells.level05: Increases Dodge invulnerability windows by 35%
cells.level06: Increases Dodge invulnerability windows by 42%

cells.name: Fleet Footed
cells.description: Temporarily increases Movement Speed after a dodge.
cells.level01: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 10% for 3 seconds
cells.level02: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 15% for 3 seconds
cells.level03: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 20% for 3 seconds
cells.level04: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 25% for 3 seconds
cells.level05: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 30% for 3 seconds
cells.level06: Following a Dodge, Movement Speed is increased by 35% for 3 seconds

cells.name: Nimble
cells.description: Restores Stamina when dodging through behemoth attacks.
cells.level01: Gain 10 Stamina after dodging through an attack
cells.level02: Gain 15 Stamina after dodging through an attack
cells.level03: Gain 20 Stamina after dodging through an attack
cells.level04: Gain 25 Stamina after dodging through an attack
cells.level05: Gain 30 Stamina after dodging through an attack
cells.level06: Gain 35 Stamina after dodging through an attack

cells.name: Swift
cells.description: Increases Movement Speed when your weapon is sheathed.
cells.level01: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 5%
cells.level02: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 10%
cells.level03: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 15%
cells.level04: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 20%
cells.level05: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 25%
cells.level06: While sheathed, increases Movement Speed by 30%</br>Also affects other nearby Slayers.

cells.name: Aetherhunter
cells.description: Increases damage against aether charged Behemoths.
cells.level04: 130% Damage vs Aether-charged Behemoths
cells.level05: 140% Damage vs Aether-charged Behemoths
cells.level06: 150% Damage vs Aether-charged Behemoths

cells.name: Deconstruction
cells.description: Bonus damage against objects created by Behemoths.

cells.level02: Deal 120% damage to objects created by Behemoths
cells.level03: Deal 130% damage to objects created by Behemoths
cells.level04: Deal 150% damage to objects created by Behemoths
cells.level05: Deal 170% damage to objects created by Behemoths
cells.level06: Deal 200% damage to objects created by Behemoths

cells.name: Knockout King
cells.description: Percent increase to Stagger damage.
cells.level04: 20% Stagger Damage</br>After dodging through an attack, the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 50%
cells.level05: 25% Stagger Damage</br>After dodging through an attack, the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 50%
cells.level06: 30% Stagger Damage</br>After dodging through an attack, the next weapon attack's Stagger is increased by 100%

cells.level04: 140% Damage vs Staggered Behemoths
cells.level05: 160% Damage vs Staggered Behemoths
cells.level06: 180% Damage vs Staggered Behemoths

cells.description: Increases Stagger damage against enraged Behemoths.
cells.level04: 140% Stagger vs Enraged Behemoths
cells.level05: 150% Stagger vs Enraged Behemoths
cells.level06: 160% Stagger vs Enraged Behemoths

cells.name: Rage
cells.description: Increases your damage when your health is low.
cells.level04: When under 50% health, deal 115% damage
cells.level05: When under 50% health, deal 120% damage
cells.level06: When under 50% health, deal 125% damage

cells.name: Ragehunter
cells.description: Increases damage against enraged Behemoths.
cells.level04: 130% Damage vs Enraged Behemoths
cells.level05: 140% Damage vs Enraged Behemoths
cells.level06: 150% Damage vs Enraged Behemoths

cells.name: Sharpened
cells.description: Percent increase to part damage.
cells.level04: +20% Part Damage</br>After dodging through an attack, the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 50%
cells.level05: +25% Part Damage</br>After dodging through an attack, the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 50%
cells.level06: +30% Part Damage</br>After dodging through an attack, the next weapon attack's Part Break Damage is increased by 100%

cells.name: Acidic
cells.description: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.
cells.level01: Converts 30% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
cells.level02: Converts 40% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
cells.level03: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
cells.level04: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage</br>+10 % Part damage
cells.level05: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage</br>+15 % Part damage
cells.level06: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage</br>+20 % Part damage

cells.name: Barbed
cells.description: Adds a flat amount of Wound damage on hit.
cells.level04: +20 Wound Damage on Hit</br>After dodging through an attack, the next attack's Expose Damage is increased by 200
cells.level05: +30 Wound Damage on Hit</br>After dodging through an attack, the next attack's Expose Damage is increased by 200
cells.level06: +40 Wound Damage on Hit</br>After dodging through an attack, the next attack's Expose Damage is increased by 400

cells.level05: +30 Part Damage on Hit</br>+200 Part Damage after dodging through an attack
cells.level06: +40 Part Damage on Hit</br>+400 Part Damage after dodging through an attack

cells.level05: 7% chance to deal double damage
cells.level06: 10% chance to deal double damage

cells.level06: +100 Wound Damage vs Staggered Behemoths

cells.level04: 160% Damage vs Wounded Parts
cells.level05: 180% Damage vs Wounded Parts
cells.level06: 200% Damage vs Wounded Parts

cells.name: Wild Frenzy
cells.description: Increases Attack Speed when at low health.

cells.level02: When under 30% health, increase attack speed by 8%
cells.level03: When under 30% health, increase attack speed by 12%
cells.level04: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 16%
cells.level05: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 20%
cells.level06: When under 50% health, increase attack speed by 25%

cells.name: Weighted Strikes
cells.description: Adds a flat amount of Stagger damage on hit. At later ranks, allows more weapon attacks to interrupt.

cells.level05: +30 Stagger Damage on Hit +200 Stagger after dodging through an attack
cells.level06: +40 Stagger Damage on Hit +400 Stagger after dodging through an attack</br>Ranged swings and missiles interrupt unstable Behemoth attacks

cells.level06: +40% Weapon Charge rate

cells.level03: When reviving an ally, they are healed an additional 30%

cells.level06: When reviving an ally, they are healed an additional 100%</br>Increases Revive Speed by 66%</br>Grants a 400 health shield for 20 seconds after reviving an ally.
